b'Tokimeki Memorial: Only Love Specials':
b'The final DVD volume contains two specials:

Tokimeki no Yuuki
Episode 18 (sometimes labeled 17.5), which was never broadcast on TV. It features the swim captain, Utsumi Koayu.

Tokimeki no Sentaku
Episode 25.5, a recap of all episodes but the last, which was initially displayed at the Konami booth for the Tokyo International Anime Fair in 2007.'
[b'Amamiya, Sayuri', b'Aoba, Riku', b'Kasuga, Tsukasa', b'Yayoi, Mina', b'Yagen, Ryuichi', b'Kinosaki, Fumihiko', b'Watatake, Haruka', b'Vice Principal', b'Utami, Hiromi', b"Matsuoka, Jun'ya"]
